kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id = txtPassword'.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get Time
kw.doc: Returns the given time in the requested format.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Comment
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.
